name: Zenduty Knowledge sharing.txt - Zoom Recording Link
description: This section provides a Zoom recording link that allows users to access a shared video recording. The link likely contains a recording of a knowledge-sharing session or a training session related to the Zenduty platform. By clicking on the link, users can view the recorded content, which may include presentations, demonstrations, or discussions on various topics related to Zenduty's features and functionalities.
use_cases: Sharing recorded content with team members or colleagues

name: Zenduty Knowledge sharing.txt - Passcode
description: This section provides a passcode or access code, which is likely used for authentication or gaining access to a specific system, application, or resource related to Zenduty Knowledge sharing. The passcode consists of a combination of alphanumeric characters and symbols, suggesting a level of security and confidentiality.
use_cases: Accessing a secure knowledge base or documentation repository
Authenticating users for sharing sensitive information or knowledge
Providing controlled access to specific resources or features within the Zenduty platform
